TopicTitle: No Reddit in the KSP on Social Media

Articles.Content: There is no link to the Reddit site in the KSP on Social media at the top of the forum. Intentional or not?

Likely intentional as not all aspects of the Reddit are Squad approved or properly managed. Not to mention Squad doesn't do much within that part of the community. It's the same reasons why they don't add the KSP Facebook group link to the forums.
Yeah, it's not official by SQUAD.

But it is listed on the Main page

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com
